SELECT P.`no` AS product_no, P.`name` AS product_name, P.detail, P.uploaded_at,
CT.no AS category_no, CT.name AS category_name,
PI.`no` AS product_image_no
FROM style_product P INNER JOIN style_category CT ON P.category = CT.no
AND P.category IN (WITH RECURSIVE `category_cte` AS ( SELECT * FROM `style_category` WHERE `no` = #{categoryNo} UNION SELECT child.* FROM `category_cte` parent INNER JOIN `style_category` child ON parent.no = child.parent ) SELECT `no` FROM `category_cte`)
INNER JOIN style_product_image PI ON P.`no` = PI.`product_no`
ORDER BY P.`name`
ORDER BY P.`uploaded_at`

SELECT *, P.`no` AS product_no, P.`name` AS product_name,
CT.no AS category_no, CT.name AS category_name,
PI.`no` AS product_image_no FROM style_product P INNER JOIN style_category CT ON P.category = CT.no INNER JOIN style_product_image PI ON P.`no` = PI.`product_no`
WHERE P.`no` = #{productNo};

SELECT C1.no AS 'parent_no', C1.name AS 'parent_name',
C2.no AS 'child_no', C2.name AS 'child_name' FROM style_category C1 LEFT OUTER JOIN style_category C2 ON C1.no = C2.parent WHERE C1.parent IS NULL

SELECT L.user_id AS loves_user_no, L.style_no AS loves_style_no, L.no AS loves_no,
S.no AS style_no,
-- Product information P1.no AS product_top_no, P1.title AS product_top_title, P1.link AS product_top_link, P1.image AS product_top_image, P1.price AS product_top_price,
P2.no AS product_outer_no, P2.title AS product_outer_title, P2.link AS product_outer_link, P2.image AS product_outer_image, P2.price AS product_outer_price,
P3.no AS product_bottom_no, P3.title AS product_bottom_title, P3.link AS product_bottom_link, P3.image AS product_bottom_image, P3.price AS product_bottom_price,
P4.no AS product_shoes_no, P4.title AS product_shoes_title, P4.link AS product_shoes_link, P4.image AS product_shoes_image, P4.price AS product_shoes_price,
P5.no AS product_bag_no, P5.title AS product_bag_title, P5.link AS product_bag_link, P5.image AS product_bag_image, P5.price AS product_bag_price
FROM loves_style L JOIN styles_product S ON L.style_no = S.no LEFT JOIN product_naver_shop P1 ON S.product_top = P1.no LEFT JOIN product_naver_shop P2 ON S.product_outer = P2.no LEFT JOIN product_naver_shop P3 ON S.product_bottom = P3.no LEFT JOIN product_naver_shop P4 ON S.product_shoes = P4.no LEFT JOIN product_naver_shop P5 ON S.product_bag = P5.no
WHERE L.`user_id` = #{id}
